Package SierpinskiTriangle

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Peg
    Peg class extends SVCustom is used by Tower class.
    SierpinskiTriangle
    SierpinskiTriangle class extends SVCustom for building Sierpinski Triangle representing Towers of Hanoi moves.
    SierpinskiTriangleBuilder
    SierpinskiTriangleBuilder class used with SierpinskiTriangle class to build Towers of Hanoi representation
    Tower
    Tower class extends SVCustom and creates a visual representation of the current state of the Towers of Hanoi game
    TriangleSide
    TriangleSide class extends SVCustom.
